bgDescription: A dish of tender tofu served in chili sauce. The appetizing spiciness of it makes Chili Sauce Tofu a widely popular dish even among the nobles of the New Federation.
description: Obtain 50% more Shell Credits when defeating enemies in the overworld, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
obtainDescription: Obtain 50% more Shell Credits when defeating enemies in the overworld, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
